snippet: The number of unemployed workers in the euro zone dropped in June, but by only 24,000 jobs, or 0.1 percent of the 19.3 million people out of work in May.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column; number of unemployed people in 17 euro zone countries declines for first time in more than two years, falling 24,000 to 19,266,000, but number of jobless remains at or near record highs in many areas.
lead_paragraph: The number of unemployed workers in the euro zone dropped in June, but by only 24,000 jobs, or 0.1 percent of the 19.3 million people out of work in May.

headline.print_headline: Jobs Recovery in Europe Is Also Painfully Slow
headline.main: Jobs Recovery in Europe Is Also Painfully Slow
